name: Code: Endure
description:
Code: Endure is a survival shooter where you fight against enemy robots in waves. 

You must kill a certain amount of robots to go to the next level.

Wave 1: 10 Kills

Wave 2: 15 Kills

Wave 3: 20 Kills

Wave 4: 25 Kills

Wave 5: 30 Kills

Run into health packs to help keep you alive. (more power ups coming soon)

Controls:

Left: "A"

Right: "D"

Jump: "W" or Space

Aim: Move mouse to aim

Shoot: left mouse button (click or hold down)
